entry.title: Saturday: Snow. Temperature steady near minus 9.
entry.summary: Snow ending this afternoon then cloudy. Wind north 30 km/h gusting to 50. Temperature steady near minus 9. Wind chill near minus 20. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NST Saturday 18 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 15.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Becoming partly cloudy this evening. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 15. Wind chill near minus 21. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NST Saturday 18 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High minus 2. POP 40%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 40 percent chance of flurries in the afternoon. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h in the morning then becoming west 20 gusting to 40 in the afternoon. High minus 2. Wind chill minus 19 in the morning and minus 8 in the afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NST Saturday 18 February 2023
